scripts.deploy: npm run build && eb list && eb use udagram-server-api-dev && eb deploy
scripts.build: npm install . && npm run clean && tsc && cp -rf src/config www/config && cp -R .elasticbeanstalk www/.elasticbeanstalk && cp .npmrc www/.npmrc && cp package.json www/package.json && 7z a -r ./www/Archive.zip ./www/*
scripts.build_test: npm install . && tsc && cp -R src/config www/config && copy -R .elasticbeanstalk www/.elasticbeanstalk && copy .npmrc www/.npmrc && copy package.json www/package.json && cd www && zip -r Archive.zip . && cd ..
scripts.test_deploy: eb use udagram-server-api-dev --profile default && eb deploy --profile default && eb setenv PORT=5432 AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=AKIA4ABJNI6TAGHI7WQ3 AWS_BUCKET=zz-udagram AWS_REGION=us-east-1 SECRET_ACCESS_KEY_ID=Cxmo55Ys1cP+OdDM1/SCuW+VFkV8IvzY8qKwx2qu JWT_SECRET=BLABLABLA POSTGRES_DB=udagram POSTGRES_HOST=database-1.cawsmombqpuf.us-east-1.rds.amazonaws.com POSTGRES_PASSWORD=123123 POSTGRES_PORT=5432 POSTGRES_USERNAME=postgres --profile default
